description: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and BuyandSell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by October 7, 2022 at 14:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.     Only TBIPS SA Holders holding a TBIPS SA for Tier 2 at the time of bid closing, in all required resource categories in this solicitation in the National Capital Region (NCR) Region under the EN578-170432 series of SAs are eligible to compete.     This requirement is for the provision of Informatics professional services to provide support through the Naval Operations Support Solutions (NOSS) to the Royal Canadian Navy (RCN) Command and Control Information Systems (C2IS) requirements for Her Majesty’s Canadian Ships (HMCS) and coastal formations and Fleet commands. It is intended to result in the award of 1 contract, each for 3 year plus 2 one-year irrevocable options allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract(s).
